ConfigurationÂ¶

Project configuration is typically managed via a YAML/JSON file (e.g., config.yaml). Key sections often include:

  • simulation: time-step (dt), duration

  • controller: controller type, gains

  • pso: swarm size, iterations, bounds

  • sensors: quantization, noise

Example (YAML):

simulation:
  dt: 0.01
  duration: 10.0

controller:
  type: sta_smc
  gains:
    k1: 10.0
    k2: 2.5

pso:
  particles: 24
  iters: 40

sensors:
  quantization_angle: 0.01
  quantization_position: 0.0005
